title: how do i go back to old client

replies.body: It is possible to [switch back](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/230175788#h1q5)- for now.  Per the guide's screenshot, you can find a button for "Launch Legacy Client" Under the login section of the test client.  Hope that helps!

PERMANENT SOLUTION:

A permanent solution is to press the windows-button > search for LoL > right click and open file location > right click again to open file location > there you can find the shortcut for LoL launcher instead of LoL client > drag launcher to task bar.

Your welcome :)

Btw this doesn't delete or change anything. So you can switch back to the new client at any time.
